scripts.generate: grpc_tools_node_protoc --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:./src/generated --grpc_out=grpc_js:./src/generated --proto_path=./src ./src/project.proto && grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=../../node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --ts_out=./src/generated --proto_path=./src ./src/project.proto && sed -i '' 's/return super.CheckProjectExists(/return super.CheckProjectExists!(/' src/generated/project.ts
